name: generate_network_graph
description: Generate a network graph chart to show relationships (edges) between entities (nodes), such as, relationships between people in social networks.

data.description: Data for network graph chart, such as, { nodes: [{ name: 'node1' }, { name: 'node2' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2', name: 'edge1' }] }

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
